Package uk.ac.ebi.ep.adapter.bioportal

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BioportalConfigMBean  
    IBioportalAdapter
    Proxy to get data from BioPortal.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BioportalConfig
    Configuration object for BioPortal proxies.
    BioportalWsAdapter
    Implementation of IBioportalAdapter using the NCBO Bioportal web services.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BioportalOntology
    Ontologies available from BioPortal and used by Enzyme Portal.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BioportalAdapterException
    Exception thrown while querying BioPortal.
